properties.entry: DELETE FROM sc_sale_schedule WHERE LISTING_SKU = '{@#sku#}' and account_id = '{@#accountId#}'
select * from sc_sale_schedule where LISTING_SKU = '{@#sku#}' and account_id = '{@#accountId#}'
select * from sc_sale_schedule where hour = '{@#hour#}' and week = '{@#week#}' and account_id = '{@#accountId#}'

INSERT INTO sc_sale_schedule ( LISTING_SKU, ACCOUNT_ID, WEEK, HOUR, PRICE, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR ) VALUES ( '{@#sku#}', '{@#accountId#}', '{@#week#}', '{@#hour#}', '{@#price#}', NOW(), '{@#loginId#}' )
